column5: Looks like you're finally getting lots of snow now, and nice fish as always
Some beauty fish there Simon.  Thanks for posting  We are still in the dreaming stage down here in the "banana belt"
Honey I shrunk the dog. What happened to Roloff?  Great report Simon. Nice chunky fish there.

Looks like you're finally getting lots of snow now, and nice fish as always  Hardly, I have not even broken out the snowblower yet. Its snowed last night, got about 15cm.  Some beauty fish there Simon.  Thanks for posting  We are still in the dreaming stage down here in the "banana belt"  The banana belt is on its way up here, they are calling for +3C Thurs, Fri and Sat!!!!??????  Honey I shrunk the dog. What happened to Roloff?  Great report Simon. Nice chunky fish there. LOLOLOLâ€¦too funny Roy, Roloff had to stay home, would have struggled to keep up as we did 80KMs all the 8 miles to that lake, Sooki travelled under mums skidoo jacket.
I thought the same thing Roy  that is the wrong video star. Nice Video Simon thanks for taking the time to shoot your trip. We got lots of people just itching for thick ice.    Art
